Name: luy-mohammadramadha
Author: Mohammad Ramadhan Sebwa, Ramadhan Hajj Ndeka, Ismail Were, Musa Murasi Salim Kukuya, Yusuf Shiundu Malala, Yahya Wafula Ojwang, Haroon Albert Msah

Translations.Text: Ne olwa liloba liliyinia emisiko chialio
Inyanga	eyo	Abandu	balirula mukhukabukhana bechesibwe ebikhole biabu
Kho ulia ukhola amalayi shinga obusiro bwoluloolo yakhakalole
Ne ulia ukhola amabii shinga obusiro bwoluloolo. yakhakalole
